item.description:
Come to the first NHC event of the decade and join us for ice skating! The Walker Rink at 1080 State St is open for public skating on Saturday from 2:30 - 4:00. Rates are:

$3 for kids
$4 for adults
Additional $4 for skate rentals.

Updated: After the event, lets go to Humphrey's East for snacks/dinner. If you're just coming for the meal, expect us to trickle in around 4:15 - 4:30. The address is:

Humphrey's East Restaurant
175 Humphrey Street, New Haven, CT - (203) 782-1506

See you there!
-Neil
203-645-2008
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a gray wool hat and falling a lot.
item.name: Afternoon Ice Sakting
